page.title: 02FARMING IN THE AREA
page.content: There are many farms within our area, in fact there are over twenty.Mount Dairy Farm has mostly pigs,Winterton Farm is mostly grazing,Monkspath Hill Farm has mostly horses and Moat Farm has mostly sheep.Box Tree Farm is a Trout Farm.The Trout Farm keeps a lot of Rainbow Trout and sells most of them to the general public. As well as selling trout,they also sell eggs.At the moment they have about two hundred trout,which they get from another trout farm.The most expensive trout is the Salmon Trout,as it is a very large trout. The Trout Farm is situated in a very good position as it is easily accessible being close to the Stratford Road.
